enteries.name: Age
entries: Ratfolks reach adulthood at 12 and can live up to 50 years.

enteries.name: Alignment
entries: Ratfolk tend towards neutral alignments. Whether charitable or selfish, they are dispositioned towards a practical mindset.

enteries.name: Size
entries: Ratfolk are noticeably shorter than humans, ranging from 4 to 5 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

enteries.name: Speed
entries: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

enteries.name: Brethren of the Swarm
entries: Mice and rats of all types will not show unprovoked hostility towards you unless threatened. Additionally, you can communicate simple ideas with them through speaking Rattus.

enteries.name: Keen Senses
entries: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that involve hearing or smell.

enteries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Rattus. Rattus is a dialect of Sylvan which is spoken with an inflection that favors chitters and squeaks.

enteries.name: Scurry
entries: You are able to slip and squeeze through small openings. You have advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) to fit through tight spaces and squeezing through narrow passages doesn't cost you extra movement.

entries.name: A Small and Curious Folk
entries: A few Ratfolk seem to be found in every city, tucked away in the crevices of a rundown district or passing through as a group of bright eyed merchants. Small, diminutive, and often quick with a sarcastic remark, they blend into the background noise of a cityscape or small forest community. And that is exactly how they prefer to have it.

Ratfolk come in a variety of colors, coats, and builds. But even more diverse than their appearance is their curiosity. It is seldom a day that goes by that a Ratfolk isn't poking their nose into a new experience or trinket, for good or bad. It is said that a Ratfolk that sits still too long may die of boredom.
